verses.roman:
"bahu-dina manoratha tomā' dekhibāre
jagannātha pūrṇa kailā, dekhiluṅ tomāre

synonyms: bahu-dina—for a long time; manoratha—my desire; tomā' dekhibāre—to see You; jagannātha—Lord Jagannātha; pūrṇa kailā—has fulfilled; dekhiluṅ tomāre—I have seen You.
translation: "For a long time," he said,"I have desired to see You, my Lord. Now Lord Jagannātha has fulfilled this desire; therefore I am seeing You.
